title: 4bdrm Farm House in Mtwapa Creek for rent
property_details:
This farmhouse offers a spacious living experience with 4BR, set on a 4-acre plot of land available for long-term rental at the affordable rate of Ksh 150,000 per month. The property is securely enclosed with a wall fence and is situated in Mtwapa, conveniently close to the picturesque Creek Beach.
The farm itself is a lush paradise adorned with an abundance of mango trees, coconut trees, oranges, and more. Its fertile land makes it an ideal location for various farming endeavours, including poultry and other agricultural businesses. The property boasts a reliable and ample water supply to support your agricultural activities.
its strategic location allows for easy access to the Mbsa-Mlnd highway, just a 12-minute drive away. You'll also find a shopping centre within close proximity, providing convenience for your daily needs.

title: 3bdrm Apartment in Langata for rent
property_details:
This gorgeous 3 bedroom master ensuite apartment with in a very secure and quiet gated community is up for rent.
 The apartment has a large ensuite master bedroom with large wardrobes. It has a large living room and a separate dining area. title: 3bdrm Apartment in Muthiga for rent
property_details:
3 Bedroom Apartment For Rent in Muthiga
Looking for a modern and comfortable home? This 3-bedroom apartment For Rent inMuthiga offers spacious living, great security, and easy access to key areas.
The living room is large and well-lit, perfect for relaxation. The master bedroom is ensuite, while the other bedrooms are spacious with plenty of storage. The closed kitchen has granite countertops and ample cabinet space.
Enjoy the balcony, which also has a provision for a washing machine. A high-speed lift makes movement easy, and the backup generator ensures a steady power supply. Borehole water and hot water showers provide convenience.
Its prime location allows easy access to Westlands, Nairobi CBD, Kikuyu Town, Southern Bypass, Lavington, and Spring Valley. Schools, shopping malls, and hospitals are nearby.

title: 4bdrm Maisonette in Thindigua Estate for rent
property_details: For rent by owner. Newly renovated 4 bedrooms, 3 bathroom house with modern finishes. Located within own compound in a scenic, serene and leafy environment where occasionally, cheerful vervet monkeys, and birds will wander amongst the full trees. House has an enclosed front porch as well as an attached garage with convenient access into the house from a side door. Reliable water supply and pre-paid electricity metre. The area is conveniently close to shopping malls (Ridgeways Mall, Ciata Mall, Garden City Mall, and Two Rivers Mall).
